t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = map(int, raw_input().split())
    count = 0
    pslope = 0
    for i in range(len(l)-1):
        cslope = l[i+1]-l[i]
        if(pslope!=0):
            if((cslope>0 and pslope<0) or (cslope<0 and pslope>0)):
                count = count + 1
        pslope = cslope
    print count
